description: seated crowned virgin, on a pedestal, holding child in left arm and a flower in her right hand; elaborate drapes behind; IHS in circle upper left corner; MRA in a circle upper right corner
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in image at bottom in black: Con privi sui / pont Raph Sadeler fecit / Is Fran\'s Motiliani/ Foroli Deliniaut
title: Print
